      • open

        public void open()
        Description copied from interface: Connection
        Opens network connection to the server. Please note, that usually this method will return immediately and won't wait while connection is established. (connection process is asynchronous).
        Specified by:
        open in interface Connection

      • startClose

        protected void startClose​(java.lang.Throwable closeReason)
        Description copied from class: com.genesyslab.platform.commons.connection.impl.AbstractConnection
        Perform "before close" cleanup. Used for graceful close operation. Please note, that it is implementation responsibility to complete close operation (call doClose()) at some point after startClose(). forceClose() won't call this method, it will call doClose() directly
        Specified by:
        startClose in class com.genesyslab.platform.commons.connection.impl.AbstractConnection
        Parameters:
        closeReason - Reason to close connection

      • doClose

        protected void doClose​(java.lang.Throwable closeReason)
        Description copied from class: com.genesyslab.platform.commons.connection.impl.AbstractConnection
        Perform close operation itself. Here the resources used by connection should be actually freed. This method is used in both graceful and force close operations. The logic that performs "before close" cleanup should be defined in startClose() method. Call super.doClose() to set appropriate connection state and notify handlers.
        Overrides:
        doClose in class com.genesyslab.platform.commons.connection.impl.AbstractConnection
        Parameters:
        closeReason - Reason to close connection
